products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and an advanced camera system with Night mode and ProRAW.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.description: The iPad Pro features an M1 chip, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and 5G capabilities. It also supports the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

products.name: MacBook Pro
products.description: The MacBook Pro features the powerful M1 Pro or M1 Max chip, stunning Retina display, and up to 10 hours of battery life. It's the ultimate pro notebook.
